review: Very experienced doctor. She explains every procedure thoroughly before performing them. ******* * *** ** ********* ********* ****** ******** *** ******* ******** ** ***** ****. Extremely professional, stable hands that are fast and  effective. Definitely value for the buck.  Ambience is great, clean and professional equipment. I Highly recommend this place.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
My husband had recently done the root canal treatment recently with Dr Punit and was very happy with the treatment. Immediately I also started my treatment.  I find her very sincere, honest and courteous with the patients. She is doing a very good job. 
Only one suggestion or rather general view of all patients  that Dr vasan clinic has been a little more expensive from other Dental clinic in Chembur. That can be considered if possible. My husband is the patient of Dr vasan since more than 20  years. All the best Dr Punit. Keep it up.

tags: None
review: Excellent.  Punit is a very professional,  patient and kind doctor who is extremely good at putting the patients at ease. Absolutely no waiting time. Very nicely explained the procedure at every step ,  which helps to know what to expecr in terms of pain etc and what to do. Overall an excellent clinic with wonderful doctors and efficient and polite assistants.  Glad to have Punit as my dentist.
